name: RISE OF THE PHANTOM ROSES
description:
It's been 1 year since the battle against Inverse Harold ended...

This game follows the standard RPGMaker cast of, Marsha, Therese, and a new girl Eliza, as they attempt to thwart a bank robbery under their team alias, "The Phantom Roses!" However, a nasty secret is waiting for them just around the corner...

This game was made for the 2023 Harold Ascent of the Allies Game Jam and was made in a week (excluding the many scraped variants I had).

I hope you all enjoy :)

The gameplay was inspired by Final Fantasy X-2, with its Dress mechanic.

Playtime: about 15-30 minutes
